title: VPC Flow Logs - Enabled + Storage Archived
test_description: Validate that NSG Flow Logs are enabled via Network Watcher and properly archived to the specified storage account for compliance and monitoring requirements

api_calls.name: get_workspace_managed_rg
api_calls.post_processing: function processStep(responseData, currentVariables) { let managedResourceGroup = responseData?.properties?.managedResourceGroupId; if (!managedResourceGroup) { managedResourceGroup = '/subscriptions/' + currentVariables.subscription_id + '/resourceGroups/' + currentVariables.resource_group; } let effectiveResourceGroup = managedResourceGroup; if (managedResourceGroup.includes('/')) { effectiveResourceGroup = managedResourceGroup.split('/').pop(); } else { effectiveResourceGroup = currentVariables.resource_group; } logger.debug('Extracted effective_resource_group:', effectiveResourceGroup); return { ...currentVariables, managed_resource_group: managedResourceGroup, effective_resource_group: effectiveResourceGroup }; }

api_calls.name: query_nsg_flow_logs
api_calls.post_processing: function processStep(responseData, currentVariables) { const flowLogEnabled = responseData?.properties?.enabled || false; const storageId = responseData?.properties?.storageId || ''; const flowLogProperties = responseData?.properties || {}; logger.debug('Flow log enabled:', flowLogEnabled, 'Storage ID:', storageId); return { ...currentVariables, flow_log_enabled: flowLogEnabled, storage_id: storageId, flow_log_properties: flowLogProperties }; }

parser_code: function aggregateResults(stepResults) { const workspaceStep = stepResults.get_workspace_managed_rg; const flowLogsStep = stepResults.query_nsg_flow_logs; const expected_result = 'VPC Flow Logs: Enabled & archived to S3.'; let actual_result = 'VPC Flow Logs: Not enabled/archived'; if (workspaceStep.error) { return { status: 'fail', message: 'Failed to get workspace managed resource group information', code: 'WORKSPACE_RG_FAILED', test_id: 'IQ-107-3', title: 'VPC Flow Logs - Enabled + Storage Archived', expected_result, actual_result }; } if (flowLogsStep.error) { return { status: 'fail', message: 'Failed to query NSG flow logs information', code: 'FLOW_LOGS_QUERY_FAILED', test_id: 'IQ-107-3', title: 'VPC Flow Logs - Enabled + Storage Archived', expected_result, actual_result }; } const flowLogProperties = flowLogsStep.data?.properties || {}; const flowLogEnabled = flowLogProperties.enabled || false; const storageId = flowLogProperties.storageId || ''; let archived = !!storageId; if (flowLogEnabled && archived) { actual_result = 'VPC Flow Logs: Enabled & archived'; return { status: 'pass', message: 'NSG flow logs enabled and archived to storage account. Monitoring requirements met.', code: 'FLOW_LOGS_OK', test_id: 'IQ-107-3', title: 'VPC Flow Logs - Enabled + Storage Archived', expected_result, actual_result }; } else { actual_result = 'VPC Flow Logs: Not enabled/archived'; return { status: 'fail', message: 'NSG flow logs not enabled or not archived to storage account.', code: 'FLOW_LOGS_FAIL', test_id: 'IQ-107-3', title: 'VPC Flow Logs - Enabled + Storage Archived', expected_result, actual_result }; } }
